document.full_text: a former portfolio manager at raj rajaratnam's galleon group described pressure at the hedge fund to get "an edge" in trading and said he gave inside tips from a morgan stanley investment banker to his boss.
document.title: rajaratnam manager testifies he gave his boss tips
lines_and_colors: a former portfolio manager at raj rajaratnam's galleon group described pressure at the hedge fund to get "an edge" in trading and said he gave inside tips from a morgan stanley investment banker to his boss.
